reporter-output.line: Step 1 - Verify title of the homepage.

Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Goibibo - Best Travel Website. Book Hotels, Flights, Trains, Bus and Cabs with upto 50% off expected title is Goibibo - Best Travel Website. Book Hotels, Flights, Trains, Bus and Cabs with upto 50% off
Step 2 - Click on the Hotels link from the top.
Hotel link is clicked from the Home page.
Step 3 - Verify the title of the Hotel homepage.

Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Online Hotel Booking | Book Cheap, Budget and Luxury Hotels -Goibibo expected title is Online Hotel Booking | Book Cheap, Budget and Luxury Hotels -Goibibo
Step 4 - Set the search criteria to search hotels and click Search Hotels button.
Setting up search criteria on Hotel Search page.
Ooty City 569 Hotels is displayed.
Location Ooty sent to text box and first option offerred is selected
Check In day is 18 month is April Check Out day is 19
Verifying guest count. Expected guest count is 1 actual is 1
Verifying room count. Expected room count is 1 actual is 1
Clicking on the search hotels from Hotle Search page.
Step 5 - Verify the title of the Results page.
Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Results expected title is Results
Step 6 - Get the first hotel name and count number of hotels.
First Hotel name found in Results is Mountain Trails
Hotel name is Mountain Trails
Hotel count is 569
Step 1 - Verify title of the homepage.

Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Goibibo - Best Travel Website. Book Hotels, Flights, Trains, Bus and Cabs with upto 50% off expected title is Goibibo - Best Travel Website. Book Hotels, Flights, Trains, Bus and Cabs with upto 50% off
Step 2 - Click on the Hotels link from the top.
Hotel link is clicked from the Home page.
Step 3 - Verify the title of the Hotel homepage.

Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Online Hotel Booking | Book Cheap, Budget and Luxury Hotels -Goibibo expected title is Online Hotel Booking | Book Cheap, Budget and Luxury Hotels -Goibibo
Step 4 - Set the search criteria to search hotels and click Search Hotels button.
Setting up search criteria on Hotel Search page.
Noida City 430 Hotels is displayed.
Location Noida sent to text box and first option offerred is selected
Check In day is 22 month is April Check Out day is 25
Verifying guest count. Expected guest count is 1 actual is 1
Verifying room count. Expected room count is 1 actual is 1
Clicking on the search hotels from Hotle Search page.
Step 5 - Verify the title of the Results page.
Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Results expected title is Results
Step 6 - Get the first hotel name and count number of hotels.
First Hotel name found in Results is Hotel Vizima Palace
Hotel name is Hotel Vizima Palace
Step 7 - Click on the hotel appeared first in the result set.
Parent Window handle is CDwindow-50E9ED61670B1D4CEB98667AD8B7504E
Child window handle is CDwindow-40572864A213A40F8AF96D35278793B8
First hotel from the search result has been clicked.
Step 8 - Verify the title of the hotel detail page.
Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Hotel Vizima Palace Noida - Reviews, Photos & Offers expected title is Hotel Vizima Palace
Step 9 - Verify the name of the hotel is same as it was on the previous page.
Hotel name from previous page: Hotel Vizima Palace and from detail page: Hotel Vizima Palace matches.
Step 10 - Click on room options and select the first room option.
Step 11 - Verify the title of the review booking page.

Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Book Cheap Flights, Air Tickets, Hotels, Bus & Holiday Package at Goibibo expected title is Book Cheap Flights, Air Tickets, Hotels, Bus & Holiday Package at Goibibo
Step 12 - Verify the name of the hotel is same as it was on the previous page.
Hotel name from review page is Hotel Vizima Palace
Hotel name from previous page: Hotel Vizima Palace and from review page: Hotel Vizima Palace matches.
Step 13 - Verify the room type option and check-in details are same as it was on the previous page.
On Review page; Room type is Classic Room
Room Type from previous page: Classic Room and from review page: Classic Room matches.
Step 14 - Enter the guest details and click on payment options button.
Review page: guest details entered is: First Name = TestFirst Last Name = TestLast Email = test@gmail.com Mobile No.= 9087654387 Expected check-in time = Special Request Text = Veg please
Payment Options button has been clicked having text: Proceed To Payment Options
Step 15 - Verify the title of Payment Page.

Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Book Cheap Flights, Air Tickets, Hotels, Bus & Holiday Package at Goibibo expected title is Book Cheap Flights, Air Tickets, Hotels, Bus & Holiday Package at Goibibo
Step 16 - Set the card details and click on pay button.
Payment Page-Card details entered; Card number:= 371449635398431 Name on Card:= John Smith Expiry month and year:= 10/22 CVV number= 3569
Pay button is clicked and button's text is Pay â‚¹6,920
Step 17 - Verify the title of confirm Pages.
Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is American Express SafeKey expected title is American Express SafeKey
Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is SafeKey expected title is SafeKey
Expected title matches with actual title. Actual Title is Thank you for choosing Goibibo. expected title is Thank you for choosing Goibibo.
Step 18 - Verify the error message.
Error message showing up on confirmation page is We are sorry but the transaction failed.
